name: The Cage (Cyaygel)
description:
Hello there!!

This is The Cage's demo version with just 3 levels. It is still on development. The reason publishing this early is to take feedbacks on the idea. 

The Cage is simply a puzzle game where you try to "capture" the point and reach the exit. But if you don't aware your rotation, you might destroy the points.

This is a one person project. So music, artstyle and programming made by me. You can check out my twitter or instagram to see more about the process.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/bizdemiolduk

Insta: https://www.instagram.com/republicofdoodles/
